title: Slayers Next
synopsis: In the kingdom of Xoana, Lina Inverse and Gourry Gabriev unexpectedly come across their old companions, Zelgadis Graywords and Princess Ameilia Wil Tesla Saillune. Upon their reunion, the friends end up easily foiling the King of Xoana and his daughter's dastardly plans of world conquest.
characters: ['Inverse, Lina', 'Graywords, Zelgadis', 'Gabriev, Gourry', 'Saillune, Amelia Wil Tesla', 'Xellos', 'Nels Laada, Sylphiel', 'Lord of Nightmares', 'Phibrizo', 'Navratilova, Martina Zoana Mel', 'El Di Saillune, Philionel']
voices: ['Hayashibara, Megumi', 'Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Suzuki, Masami', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Hayashibara, Megumi', 'Ikura, Kazue', 'Ishimura, Tomoko', 'Anzai, Masahiro']
